title: I'm Big!
description: From Kate and Jim McMullan, the popular creators of I Stink! and I’m Dirty! —now a streaming animated series—comes a hilarious new picture book about one BIG dino who’s just trying to find his herd again. He’s BIG, a whole lotta lizard-thunder comin’ at you! But he’s also…lost. Have you seen his herd? BOOM, BOOM! Uh, oh! Help this sorry sauropod find his pals before he becomes lunch for some hungry predator. Yikes!
author: Kate McMullan
